verses.samhita: aSmA# ca mEq mRutti#kA ca mE giqraya#Sca mEq parva#tASca mEq sika#tASca mEq vanaqspata#yaSca mEq hira#NyaM caq mE &ya#Sca mEq sIsaM# ca mEq trapu#Sca mE SyAqmaM ca# mE lOqhaM ca# mEq&gniSca# maq Apa#Sca mEvIqrudha#Sca maq OSha#dhayaSca mE kRuShTapaqcyaM ca# - [  ] 9

mE &kRuShTapaqcyaM ca# mE grAqyAMSca# mE paqSava# AraqNyASca# yaqj~jEna# kalpantAM ~MviqttaM ca# mEq vitti#Sca mE BUqtaM ca# mEq BUti#Sca mEq vasu# ca mE vasaqtiSca# mEq karma# ca mEq Sakti#Scaq mE&rtha#Sca maq Ema#Sca maq iti#Sca mEq gati#Sca mE || 10
